features: Get long-lasting, 24-hour odor and wetness protection with Suave Shower Fresh Invisible Solid Deodorant and antiperspirant for women
Suave Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant stays on skin, not on clothes, so you get effective underarm protection with no messy residue
This is Suave's best deodorant for women and it's recommended for everyday use
Enjoy underarm sweat and odor protection with refreshing, clean, shower fresh scent
Suave Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant stick goes on clear so you feel clean and refreshed all day
body.description: Suave Fresh 24-Hour Protection Solid Invisible Antiperspirant Deodorant protects skin against underarm sweat all day long. Suave's deodorant for women is perfect for active people, and will work to keep you dry and odorless all day. This deodorant for women will fight against sweat to prevent any unsightly sweat patches, and the fresh, pleasant scent in this Suave women's deodorant will keep you smelling good. When you're looking for a strong deodorant, it's best to look for an antiperspirant that will provide protection from underarm block with deo that will keep you smelling good. It's also important to find a product that won't stain your clothes or leave any residue on your skin. You can protect your clothes with this Suave deodorant, which is in a mess-free stick form that glides on and won't leave any residue or telling white marks on your clothes. This Suave anti perspirant deodorant for women works best when used with other body and hair products in the Suave range. Experiment with different deodorant scents, and try Sweet Pea and Violet or the Coconut Kiss option. Try Suave Professionals body and personal wash for a clean feeling. Experience quality protection with strong deodorant, and feel clean and refreshed when you use the body wash and shampoo and conditioner products available in the Suave range.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This long-lasting deodorant protects against sweat and odor for a full 48 hours, leaving you feeling dry and smelling fresh from morning to night. You can apply it without worry thanks to its anti-staining formula.

Anti-staining formula Apply without worry thanks to our anti-staining, anti-white mark formula. A Suave for you Our range of antiperspirants and deodorants feature long-lasting protection and a scent you’ll love. Our Promise Suave is dedicated to making gold standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look, smell and feel good daily. Cruelty-free Globally, Suave does not test on animals and is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA.

Suave Powder Invisible Solid Women's Deodorant & Antiperspirant Suave Sweet Pea & Violet Invisible Deodorant & Antiperspirant Suave Wild Cherry Blossom Invisible Solid Women's Deodorant & Antiperspirant Main Benefit Enjoy that fresh-out-of-the-shower feeling all day long with this 48-hour fresh anti-staining deodorant and antiperspirant, in a fresh powder scent Feel fresh all day long with this 48-hour anti-staining deodorant and antiperspirant, made with a vibrant floral scent of Sweet Pea & Violet Feel fresh all day long with this 48-hour anti-staining deodorant and antiperspirant, made with a fresh floral scent of Wild Cherry Blossom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have used Suave deodorant for years. And I used the "Powder" scent for years and loved it. In purchasing two Powder scent ones recently, I realized they did something differently for the scent, but still called it Powder. I hated the new scent and it gave me a headache. So then I decided to try the one that says FRESH and love it!! It is light and not overpowering and very pleasant!!! So now I bought a backup of the one marked Fresh and will stick to that!!! Don't buy the one that says Powder because it's overpowering and smells yuk.... the one that says Fresh is lovely!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great classic that works!
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for me! I sweat a good amount and I have tried sooo many aluminum free deodorants lately that don't work! I was so happy to finally get a good working deodorant! The negative reviews always scare me but this came looking completely brand new and there is nothing wrong with it. It's a classic and a great working deodorant for the money! I think I will start using this one instead of my old favorite dove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works for me but can leave white marks on dark clothing.
reviews.reviewText: I am not one to perspire heavily or often but I always wear antiperspirant/deodorant to be sure I never end up with wet stains under my arms or smelling like sweat. Yuck! I generally like clear solids but this Suave antiperspirant was only $1.39 as an add on so I ordered it. It is a white solid that is cranked up by twisting the bottom until the stick reaches the desired level. It smells great. Not like powder which I don't like but like something very slightly floral and fresh.The stick is really silky and doesn't sting even if I use it right after I shave my armpits. It doesn't leave a white residue under my arms but it will leave white marks on dark clothing if I am not careful to avoid letting the fabric come in contact with the antiperspirant when getting dressed. Once I am dressed, I have not noticed any white marks on my clothes. The marks from dressing do come off easily with a damp cloth. For my needs, this product works fine. I haven't had any issues with perspiring even when working out hard. I think, if you are one who perspires heavily, this may not do the trick completely but, if you're like me and just need something to protect you from the occasional perspiration that comes from stress, heat, or during exercise, you'll find this Suave product works as well as pricier brands. I removed a star because it can leave white marks on clothing. I still prefer clear solids but certainly will use this stick and, depending on how effective it is over the long haul, will repurchase it when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good antiperspirant, newly overpriced
reviews.reviewText: The last time I ordered this as a subscribe-and-save item, it cost me $1.70--a very good price. Now the price, even for a pack of six, is $2.70 apiece.I go to my local Walmart only twice a year, given that "local" means 35 miles in this case and the destination is, after all, a Walmart supercenter. If the convenience of buying at Amazon suits you, so be it. But I have put this on my list for the next semi-annual trip to the supercenter, where this deodorant costs $1.83. (I checked the inventory and price on the Internet for this particular store.)I understand inflation, but it seems it would affect all retailers more evenly than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice light scent, great price.
reviews.reviewText: I use this daily. I like the light scent, doesn't compete with my perfume. It doesn't stain my clothes. On my day off I enjoy yard word (mowing, edging, trimming trees), I sweat. This helps with the stink. I was skeptical at first, but it does its job. Great price. Great product. Don't go a day without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Deodorant for the Best Price
reviews.reviewText: I have used this brand of deodorant basically all my life! It is a good deodorant for a really good price. I don't need to re-apply all day, even if I exercise in the middle of the day. It also has a good scent! I do not see any difference between this deodorant than others that are more expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Pleasant Surprise
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this deodorant for a couple months now and I'm pleasantly surprised by how well it works, especially for the price. It even keeps working for a couple of days!The scent is pleasant: not overpowering or sickly sweet.I haven't noticed any white residue or stains on my shirts either.I'd definitely buy this again.

He probado otros desodorantes de esta marca y sinceramente la recomiendo, pero este desodorante “FRESH” en concreto tiene un extraño olor a nada rozando ligeramente el mal olor. E desagrada, pero de lo cual el vendedor no tiene culpa. Además llegaren bien y antes de lo previsto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I prefer this deodrant to any other
Everything a deodrant should be, turned out perfect for me!

Bestes Deo ever. Deo leider mit Aluminium.. aber daher volle Sicherheit selbst bei tropischen Temperaturen. Keinerlei unangenehmen KörperGeruch. Kauf ich wieder. Ist bereits mein 2. hält fast einen Sommer lang. Schnelle Lieferung aus USA. Top!!!!MIKE

This is now my go to brand for long lasting effective deodorants. I prefer this scent from the tropical one as it smells light and clean and doesn’t overwhelm my perfumes. It is easy to wash off unlike most of these solid cream deodorants. It is also a larger size and lasts longer!
